extension.name: ExampleExternalCQLLibrary
extension.description: External CQL Library that has an expression 'externalMultiplyFn' defined which we will call below. See https://hl7.org/fhir/R5/library.html to see library resource definition

item.text: Multiply 2 * 3 in text/cql using external library

valueExpression.description: Multiply two numbers via cql expression found in an external library.  See https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/expressions.html#use-of-the-expression-type
